title: Introducing the Penny
description: In this book, you will meet a penny named--Penny! Penny will tell you all about where and when she and her friends were born, her interesting history, and how her looks have changed over time. The reader will also learn many interesting facts about how pennies are made. Detailed photographs enhance the text.
